translation_info.title: KAKAIYARI NIUKIEYA XAPAYARI WIXARIKAKƗ
translation_info.license: Creative Commons License: Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

verses.text: Kemitiunierixi Kitsariyaxi 'Amuxi nu'aya Kura nuiwariyari hepaitsita meta Kerutsareme, 'Utsiyaxi, Kutani, 'Akatsi meta 'Etsekiyaxi, Kura kwieyaritsie te'aitamete mete'aitakaku.

Muyuawi, xekeneu'enana[cite: 498]. Kwie, meta keneu'ena[cite: 499]. Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 500]: «Ne tiri nekaniwarutiwaweriya 'ameyumateme nekaniwarayeitiani [cite: 502, 503], peru miki menetsi'aye'unieti mekanakine[cite: 504]. 3 Tuuru kwietsaname yukutsiyari kanimateni [cite: 504] meta puxi kanemarieka hakewa kutsiyarieya mireitimikwa [cite: 504], peru 'ixaheritsixi mipai mepikatemate, neteiterima mepikaheu'enana [cite: 505]».

Xia'ui nuiwari 'axateyuruwamete [cite: 506], teiteri xehetsie mirahiiwa [cite: 506], 'axateyuruwamete nuiwariyari [cite: 507], türi heitseriemeki yaxemikateyurie[cite: 507]. Yawé xekaniuku'eirieni[cite: 508]. Mipatsie 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme tihikitime xepika'ayeitia[cite: 510, 511]. Yu'itima xekanekine[cite: 512].

¿Ketitayari tawarita xetetiweiwani[cite: 513]? ¿Ketitayari xete'iyeweiyani xe'eye'unieti[cite: 514]? Naitiri'amu'u kaniweiyaka [cite: 515], tixaiti [cite: 516] naitiri 'a'iyari katinikuyeni[cite: 520].

Xeketatetsie tsutiti xeyekirita paiti ye'ati [cite: 521] miki naitsarie xepiteheukukuye [cite: 523]: naimetsie xepeukuyuyuawi [cite: 525], xepeukuweiyatika [cite: 526], meta haiya hayepietikaime xepexeiya [cite: 527], nixewiti pikaxeti'uayemawe [cite: 529] pikaxe'anakihiaxiawe [cite: 530], nixewiti hatseitiki pikaxeka'uayemawe[cite: 531].

Xekwieyaritsie kanakumaweni [cite: 532], meta kiekariteya tai harakunayari kanihikitikani [cite: 534], metanenierekakutiti kikamete wa'etsarita timieme mekateniukaxiriwani [cite: 536, 537], wakwie kanakumaweni [cite: 538], 'ateewa kiekatari memiwaruka'una hepai[cite: 539].
Tsiyuni witsimiti'iimari xamaru 'ewiweme harawerita mieme hepai kaniuyini [cite: 541], pinixi ma'etsietsie 'etipiweme hepai kaniuyini [cite: 542], kiekari manutinamieka hepai kani'aneni[cite: 542].
Xika Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye hipame kawaruhayewake me'ayeneniereme [cite: 543], hiki xiari Tsuruma hepai piraku'anenike [cite: 544], meta xiari Kumuxa hepai tepauyewenike[cite: 544].
Yawé niukieya xekeneu'eni [cite: 545], xeme Tsuruma hetsie xemite'aita[cite: 546]. Xekeneu'eni takakaiyari 'ikitiarikaya, Kumuxa kiekatari[cite: 547].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 548]: «Tixaiti pikatihiki waikawa meminetemawirie[cite: 549, 550, 551]. Muxatsi 'ukitsi wamawari taiyarikaki 'ari nepiwairipieri [cite: 556, 557] meta tewaxi memiwaiyatika wawiyayariki [cite: 558], tuurutsixi, muxatsi meta tsipuri waxuriya pikanetsinake[cite: 559, 560].
¿Titayari nehixie xete'axe[cite: 561]? ¿Kemi'ane pixe'uta'aitia tewaxi xemiwa'atiwaniki [cite: 562, 563] netuki takwa memite'akuketsinaniki[cite: 565, 566, 567]?

Xepikanetsi'atiiriwaniri mawari tixaiti mikatihiki [cite: 569, 570], 'ikwa witsimu'ia nekanixani'erieka[cite: 573]. Metsa manatiwenitsie, 'uxipiya mirayutixexeiritiretsie[cite: 574, 575], nepikayiweri nemitinewieka yaki xeikia kememinetexeiyay.
Metsa 'ixiarariyari meta wa'ixiarari naime ne nepixani'erie [cite: 578], xekaneniuti'ikatiani [cite: 579] netinewietiri nepu'uxe[cite: 580].
Kepauka teiki xemememe [cite: 581], ne nepikaxexeiyaniri [cite: 582], tsepaneti yunenewieri xemimiiriya [cite: 583], ne nepika'i'enieni [cite: 584], yumamatetsie naiti xemeuxuxureki[cite: 585].
Xekeneuyuhauxixia, xekeneuyu'itiexia[cite: 586]. Nehixieri 'axaxepikateyurieka[cite: 586]. 'Axaxeteyurieti xeketeneuhayewa[cite: 587].

'Aixia miti'ane pita xeketenemaika[cite: 587]. Mitiheitserie xekeneutiwawa [cite: 588], mitiuyukananaima xekeneutati'a[cite: 589]. Nutui hetsiemieme xekeneutaniu meta wiura hetsie xekenenuaka[cite: 590].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 594]: «Xekenakini, 'aixia tepitayurieni [cite: 596, 598] 'ahekiakameki [cite: 597], ¿'Axakexemiteyurieki xuriya muweka hepai ti'ane[cite: 599]? 'Iwi hepai tituxati kanayeimiki[cite: 600]. ¿'Axakexemiteyurieki tixeta miyitsikimaiyeni hepai[cite: 601, 602]? Muxa huxarieya mutuxa hepai kaniyimiki[cite: 603].

Xika xeme xeyuwairiyani yaxemitekakineki [cite: 604], kwiepa timieme 'aixia miti'anene xekatenikwakakuni[cite: 607, 608]. Xika xekayuwairiyani meta 'akuxi xeheye'unieka [cite: 609, 610], 'Ixiparaki xekanikwi'iwakuni [cite: 612]».

Yawé mipai kaniutayuni[cite: 613]. Kiekari pemikawatayuanekai hikiri xeime hamatia tuminiki pepukahupu[cite: 614, 615]. Meripaiti 'aixia ti'aneme waikawa pepirexeiyakai[cite: 616, 617]. Mitiheitserie hetsiena puyuhayewakai [cite: 618], hiki matsi teyumiekate mepuyuhayewatiwe[cite: 620, 621].

'Apirata temixikiti kanayani [cite: 622], 'akaxie winuyari 'aixia ma'ane, haa kanayani[cite: 625]. Te'aitamete mepunetsi'aye'unie [cite: 627], tenawayamete mepuwa'iwama [cite: 628], yunaiti 'itarikaki miemete metekuxatati memitepitiariekaki mepinaki'erie tixaiti xeikia mepite'iwaku[cite: 630, 633, 634]. Nutui hetsiemieme mepikahaniutika [cite: 635], meta wiura hetsiemieme[cite: 635].

'Ayumieme Ti'aitame mipai kanaineni [cite: 639], Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 640], mitirikaiye 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme [cite: 641]: <<<Kenemitiha'aki yanepitiyurieni meminetsi'aye'unie wahetsie [cite: 643, 644], nekatiniwarakapitiamiki miki kememinet- si'uyuri[cite: 645, 648]. 25 Tawarita netirikariya xehetsie nepitatuani [cite: 649], temixikiyari xapuniki nepuku'itieni [cite: 650] meta naime nekanakuyeitiamiki titaki pemikati'itiyakaiki[cite: 651, 653]. 26 'A'itsikate 'aixia nekaniwatiyurimiki matiari hepai [cite: 654, 655], meta 'a'ixatsitiwamete matiari hepai[cite: 656]. Hiki 'ana Kiekari heitserie mexeiya pekatinite- wakamiki [cite: 657, 658], Kiekari mikawatayuitiariwa [cite: 659]». 27 Tsiyuni pinanaiyani mitawikweitsitiarieniki tika'eniexiame [cite: 660, 661], meta tita mitiheitserieki, kemi'ane mitihayewa 'axatiyurieneti[cite: 662]. 28 Peru kemi'ane memikayuwairiya meta 'axamemiteyurie mekanikumaweriyariekuni [cite: 663, 664], meta mekanikwikuni kemi'ane Yawé memuku'eirieni[cite: 665, 667]. 29 Xekanititewiyakuni xiu kiyeyari kwinimieme xemitenaki'erie [cite: 669, 670], tuturite muwa'iteitsietsie memenayexei wahetsiemieme [cite: 671, 672] tewiyarika katinayeimiki[cite: 672]. 30 Xiu kiyeyari xawariyari muwawaki hepai kani- tiyimiki [cite: 673, 674], haraweri tuturi miwa'etsietsie mika'ukahatuiyariwa hepai[cite: 675, 677, 678]. 31 Tewi mitirikaiye miaxa hepai kaniyimiki [cite: 682], meta 'uximayatsikaya tai tsipirikiyari hepai [cite: 683], 'axeikia hutati kanititaimiki [cite: 684], xewiti pumaweni mitiniki[cite: 685]. Yawé hirieya [cite: 686] (Kits 2:1-4 - Mik 4:1-3)
Kitsariyaxi kemitiunieritiarie 'Amuxi nu'aya Kura hetsiemieme meta Kerutsareme[cite: 689, 690].

'Imatirieka tukaritsie [cite: 691], hiri Yawé kiiya manuwe pikawatayuitiarieni matsi 'a'utewiti kanayeimiki [cite: 692, 693], hirite naime kana'iwamiki [cite: 694], hetsiana yunaiti nuiwarite mekani'axiakuni[cite: 695].

Teiteri meyumiireti mekani'axiakuni [cite: 696], meta mipai mekanitiyuakuni [cite: 697]: <<Xekenakini, Yawé hirieyatsie tepanutikine, Kakuwu Kakaiyarieya kie [cite: 698], yuhuye mitatsiheta'ikitianiki [cite: 699] meta huyetana xeikia temuhuniki [cite: 700]». Kariki Tsiyunitsie xeikia kanayenexiamiki [cite: 701], 'ikitiarika meta Kerutsaremetsie Yawé niukieya[cite: 703, 704].

Miki nuiwarite watsata kaniwataxanetamiki [cite: 704] meta miki yuwaikawame wa'itsikame kanihikitikamiki[cite: 706]. Yu'ixipara hararu mepayeitiaxiani [cite: 707] meta yupitsika 'ixa mekanayeitiaxiakuni[cite: 709]. Nuiwariteri 'ixiparaki mepikayutakwini [cite: 710], xikame tawariri mepikayuti'ikitiani kuyaxa miemeki[cite: 712].
Kakuwu kiekarieya, niwa kenaye'a [cite: 713], Yawé hekiariyayatsie tepuhuni[cite: 717].

'Ateiterima pepiwaruku'eiri [cite: 719], Kakuwu nuiwarimama [cite: 720], tau manatineika kiekatari muyuawitsie miemeki memiteyi'ikitia wayeiyariki memihipineki [cite: 721], meta memitehetimamateke piritsiteutsixi kememite- warexeiya wahepai [cite: 722], meta tiratu mepuyuwewirie kiekatari wahamatia[cite: 723].

Wakwietsie huru meta pirata pihine [cite: 724], 'ateewa miraye'atika memiteheuxeiya pikati'iniari[cite: 726]. Wakwietsie kawayutsixi kwinimieme mepite'ane [cite: 727], meta wakaxetate kuyaxa mieme pikati'iniari[cite: 728].
Wakwietsie kakaiyarixi memiwewiyatika mepihine [cite: 729, 730], teiteri yuwewiya hixie mepukatunuma'uwe [cite: 732], yumamaki ketitamemite'utiwewi[cite: 733].
Tewi tixaiti pikarayeitiariwa [cite: 734], tewi pikayiwe 'atsimitiuyurieni[cite: 735]. Pikayiweri pemitiwareuyehiwirieni[cite: 736].
'Aitá keneutahaki [cite: 737], kwauni tsata keneuyuti'awieta [cite: 738] Yawé pe'ayemakati [cite: 739] meta witsikemi'aneki mariweti[cite: 740].

Kwinimieme mitiyuta'ire hixiteya tixaiti pikarayeitiarieni [cite: 742] teiteri kememiteyuti'ire wamiki [cite: 743] kanititunar- iexiariemiki[cite: 746]. 'Iya tukaritsie Yawé xeikia 'aixia katinikuxaxatsi- wamiki[cite: 747].

Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye xeime tukaritsie kanayenemiki [cite: 752] yunaiti memuyuti'ire meta mamariwaweme memayuyeitiwa wahepaitsita [cite: 753, 754], yunaime memuyuti'ukita wahepaitsita [cite: 755], tixaiti mekatehikitime miwarayeitianiki[cite: 757].
kariuxa Riwanutsie mieme [cite: 757], muyuti'ire meta kwinimieme mutiti hepaitsita [cite: 758], meta naime xiu Watsanitsie mieme hepaitsita[cite: 758].
hiri naime 'amutititsie mieme hepaitsita [cite: 759], meta yemurite 'amutiti hepaitsita[cite: 760],

tuxiyu mutiti hepaitsita [cite: 762], kwinimieme kuraru mitirikawi hepaitsita [cite: 765], naime mutiti [cite: 766] (16) yunaime kanuwate 'amupapa Taritsi miye'axe wahepaitsita [cite: 768, 769], meta yunaime kanuwate 'amupapa witsimi'anene wahepaitsita[cite: 771, 772].

Tewi kwinimieme mitiyuta'ire kanititunariexiamiki [cite: 774], teiteri kememiteyuti'ire tixaiti pikarayeitiarieni[cite: 777, 778]. 'Iya tukaritsie Yawé xeikia 'aixia katinikuxaxatsi- wamiki[cite: 779].
meta yuri memikakakaiyarixi yuheyemeki mepukumaweriyarieni[cite: 781, 782].

Teiteri terita mekaneutahaxiakuni [cite: 783], meta kwiepa makutsitsinitsie [cite: 784], Yawé me'ayemakati [cite: 785] meta witsikemi'aneki mariweti [cite: 786], kepauka miki manukukenitsie kwie tayuitianike[cite: 787].
'Iya tukaritsie tewi yukakaiyarixi huruki memiwewiyatika meta pirataki [cite: 792, 794], teuxari miki miwarutiwewiekai muwarayexeiyaniki [cite: 795, 796], meta 'atsixi puwareutaxirieni[cite: 798].

Tetexi teriyarita kaneutahamiki [cite: 799] meta 'ai mukatatarita [cite: 800], Yawé me'ayemakati memuyekietsie [cite: 801, 802] meta witsikemi'aneki mariweti [cite: 803], kepauka miki manukukeni kwie miwatayuitianiki[cite: 805].
Tewitsie yuri xete'erieti xeketeneuhayewa [cite: 806], miki 'etsiwa xeikia katinaye'aka[cite: 807]. Tukarieya xeihitsieriyari kanihikitini[cite: 808].

Tsiparatsi xekeneu'enana[cite: 811]. Ti'aitame, Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 812], Kerutsareme meta Kura pitinawairieni [cite: 813], meta naime [cite: 814] parewiya [cite: 815] memiteyumikwakai [cite: 816]: naime 'ikwai memiteheuyehiakai [cite: 817], meta naime haa kememiteheuyehiakai[cite: 817].

Miki titaki mika'utimamawe [cite: 819] meta kwinimieme mireuyutamiewe pakumaweriya [cite: 820], 'itsikame meta Kakaiyari niukameya [cite: 821], muyuawitsie miemeki mitiyi'ikitia meta 'ukiratsi [cite: 821], kuyaxi wa'ukiyari meta mariwemeki ti'uximayatame [cite: 825, 826], meta mireutawewiwe [cite: 828] 'ixatsitame [cite: 829], kwinimieme [cite: 830] meta 'utakwiti tixaitimexi mitiwawiwiya[cite: 831].

Memanuyetei temari pita nepiwarayeitiani [cite: 832], meta tiri te'aitamete nepuwarayeitiani[cite: 832]. Yuxexuiti hipame mepuyuti'uximatiani [cite: 835]: wahamatia yuhepai 'ukitsi mepuyu'uximatiaka [cite: 837], yu'aurie kiekatari [cite: 838], temaiki, 'ukiratsi hamatia [cite: 839], tewi tixaiti mikatihiki [cite: 841, 842], waikawa mitiyunaki'erie hamatia[cite: 843, 844].

Hiki xewiti tewi yu'iwa kaniwiyamiki yupaapa kie [cite: 846], mipai katinitahiawimiki [cite: 847]: <<'Eki pemanuyeyerini pepihikitini, 'eki tuwaxa 'amiyewa pemexeiyaki [cite: 848], 'iki kiekari naiti mu'unitsie [cite: 849, 850] ketineuyuri [cite: 851] 'aixia [cite: 852] 7 Matsi miki mipai katinita'eiyamiki [cite: 853]: <<Ne tiyu'uayemawame nepikahiki [cite: 854], nekie paa pikaxiawe meta tuwaxa 'amiyewa nepikahexeiya [cite: 855, 856], teiteri nemitiwata'aitianiki [cite: 858] pepikanetsi'anuyeyetsani [cite: 859]».

Kerutsareme kaniwatayuakeni [cite: 860], Kura kanika'unikeni [cite: 861], miya mepite'anuyehu [cite: 862] Yawé kemikatinake memutiyuaneki meta mipai memite'u'uwaki [cite: 863, 864]: me'ixani'erieti miki mariweti witsikemitiyuxexeiya[cite: 868].

Kememiteyurie yuhixie paiti mepumatsiiki [cite: 869] meta ke'axamemiteyurieki mekaniyutemamawieka Tsurumatari wahepai [cite: 870, 872], kememiteyurie naime mepitewaxeitsitia[cite: 873]. Xia'ui miki wahetsiemieme [cite: 873], yikimana 'axa'anekia memeuyukaxiriwaki[cite: 874].

Heitseriemeki yamitikamie mipai xeketeneutahiawi kename 'aixia 'anemeki yeyani [cite: 876], kemitiuyuriki kaniyutemawiekamiki 'ikwaxi xeiyati[cite: 877]. Ti'uximayati kemitiuyuri [cite: 878] yakatinipitiariemiki[cite: 880].
Xia'ui 'axamitiuka'iyari [cite: 875], matsi 'aixia 'anemeki pikayeyani[cite: 876]. Ti'uximayati kemitiuyuri [cite: 878] tinipitiariemiki[cite: 879].

Xia'ui neteiterima [cite: 881], wairiyarika memitewa'aitia tiiri mepihiki [cite: 881] meta 'ukarawetsixi mepite'aitamete[cite: 882]. Xia'ui neteiterima [cite: 883], memixeheuyexirie [cite: 884], memixe'uwitixime huyeta yeuta mepeukuyuyuipike[cite: 885, 886].
Yawé puyukuha'aritiwa wahetsie mirahianiki [cite: 887], 'apuwe yuteiterima wataxanetake[cite: 888].

Yawé 'iwaurika kaniwewimiki 'ukirawetsixi wahepaitsita meta yuteiterima wahixie memanuyetei [cite: 890, 891]: <<Xeme kaxie xekaniukaxitiani [cite: 892], tixaiti mikarexeiya tipiiniteya xekiita katineyepika[cite: 893, 894].

'Iya tukaritsie, 'ukarawetsixi me'atahutati 'uki xeime mepuwiya [cite: 941, 942], mipai mepite'itahiawe [cite: 942]: Tame taxaitame tepiteyumikwani meta tepiteyuketiaka [cite: 943, 944], 'eki tsikere kepemititewaki ketaneyetuiri [cite: 945]: Ketaneixina temikatewiniariekaki [cite: 945]».
'Iya tukaritsie, Yawé 'iteirieya meukuyira witsipi'aneni meta witsipitiyuxexeiyani [cite: 946], kwiepa timieme 'ikwaxi puwatemawieritiani keyupaimeti 'ixaheritsixi memitawikweni[cite: 946].

Hiki kemi'ane Tsiyunitsie 'ayeniereti muyuhayewa meta kemi'ane Kerutsaremetsie 'ayeniereti muyuhayewa miki Memipatsietika mepitetetewaka [cite: 947], meta mepaye'uxani Kerutsaremetsie tukari memexeiyaniki[cite: 947].

Ti'aitame Yawé 'iyari tiyu'uximatiwameki meta 'iyari taiki mitiyuxitsitiwaki [cite: 948], Yawé Tsiyuni niwemama 'iimarixi kaniwahauximiki titaki memikate'itiyatikateiki meta xuriya pakuyeitiani Kerutsareme kepaimeti makuxuaweni[cite: 948].

Hiki Yawé hai kitsiyari pitawewieni tukariki mieme meta tai kwinimieme 'anutatetereme tikariki mieme [cite: 952], Tsiyuni hiriyaritsie meta kemi'ane mana memuyutixexeiriwa yunaime waheima[cite: 952]. Naime xawatiriya heima panukawereni 'ikari 'atsuiti [cite: 953] 6 miki miwaranukanakaki, tukariki mi'etiriwiekaki, muwa'awietaniki wiyeriki meta wiyeri mi'ekama hepaitsita[cite: 954].

Nepitakwika nehamiku hetsiemieme neminaki'erie [cite: 960, 961] kaxie haraweriyari niawariyari hepaitsita[cite: 962]. Nehamiku kwinimieme nemitinaki'erie kaxie haraweri xeime pexeiyakai 'ukakiakaku 'aixia tiuxuaweriwekaku[cite: 963, 965].

Kaniwati'ine, tetexi kananuyexirieni 'aixia 'anekia kanika'iteita[cite: 966, 967]. Miki hixiapa tuxiyu kaniutakeni [cite: 968] meta mana matipinariwani kaniutawewieni[cite: 969]. Miki 'aixia 'aneneti pita'ikwewakai [cite: 971], kaxie mitixuawereki matsi xeikia kaxie hatsinati kaniukaxuawere[cite: 973, 974].
Hiki Kura teiteriyari [cite: 975], Kerutsareme kiekatari [cite: 976], yaxekeneutiyua kemi'ane miya'aneme peutiwiwiexia nekaxie haraweriyari nutsiti ne pinehetsiemieme[cite: 977].

¿Tawarita 'akuxi kenetiyurienikekai nekaxie haraweriyari hetsiemieme [cite: 978] tita reuyeweti ratia[cite: 980]? Ne 'aixia 'aneneti kaxie mikayaxeki nepita'ikwewakai[cite: 985, 987]. ¿Titayari kaxie hatsinati tiukaxuawerixi[cite: 988]?

Ne nepitixetaxatiani kenemitiyurieni hepaitsita [cite: 989, 990]: nekaxie haraweriyari Kuraruyari nepa'unatiyani [cite: 992, 993], tetsariya 'amititi nekanika'unamiki [cite: 994], hetsiena katina'uitimiki[cite: 995].

Yuxaita nekaniku'eirimiki [cite: 996], mikakayiraki pikakawitekieni [cite: 998] meta pikakakwietsanarieni [cite: 999], mana xuya pitinexiani meta 'itsi[cite: 1000, 1001]. Ne hai nepitita'aitiani [cite: 1002] tipiinieya [cite: 1004] kemitiuteriwarieniki [cite: 1005, 1006] miki hetsie mika'ukawiwiyeniki[cite: 1003].

Kaxie haraweriyari Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye teiteriyari Kura teiteriyari kwiepa miraka'etsitire manayexeiyarie mekanihikitini[cite: 1007, 1008, 1009, 1010]. Miki 'aixia miti'ane pititakwewiekai [cite: 1011], matsi xeikia xuriya 'uhaneme pukaxei [cite: 1012], mitiheitserie pititakwewiekai [cite: 1013], matsi xeikia kukuiniya hiwariyari pukaxei[cite: 1014].

Xia'ui 'iya kemi'ane yukii waikawa mexeiya [cite: 1016] meta kwie miraka'etsitire waikawa yupiini memite'ayeitiwa [cite: 1017, 1018] mana nixeime tima mekahayewirieti [cite: 1019, 1020] mitayeriniki [cite: 1021], yuxaita xeikia 'axeikia mepuyukuhayeikawa [cite: 1022, 1023]. mana metiteti [cite: 1025] 9 Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye mipai nerahiaweme nekaniu'enieni [cite: 1029, 1030]: «Kiite waikawati yuxaita kaniyuhayewamiki [cite: 1031], pumaweni kemi'ane kiite 'amupapata mayekaniki[cite: 1033].
Kaxie haika hetariyayari xeikixauriyari xeikia payani [cite: 1034, 1035], meta tamamata merirayari 'imiari xeimerirayari xeikia kanayeimiki[cite: 1036, 1037].
Xia'ui kemi'ane ximeri paiti memanuku'uwe winu xeikia me'iyuka memititaruweniki [cite: 1038, 1039], memukutaikaiyariwa winuki metaruweti[cite: 1040].
Wa'ixiararitsie winu puxuawe meta kanarite, xawerite, tepu meta pirikixa[cite: 1041]. Peru Yawé kemitiuyuri mepikayiki'iwiya [cite: 1042] meta ketita mitiutiwewi yamepikatemate[cite: 1042].

'Ayumieme neteiterima 'ateewa mepanuhapanieni memikanetsimateki [cite: 1044, 1045], waikawa memeuka'u hetsiana miemete haakaki mekanikwikuni [cite: 1046, 1047] meta teiteri meyumuireti mekanikwikuni[cite: 1048, 1049].

hariyaki [cite: 1050] 'Ayumieme teukiya yukiipi waikawa panatix- awariya [cite: 1051, 1052], ka'iniarimeki yuteni kananutayepiwani[cite: 1053]. Muwa mepeukakika waikawa memeuka'u meta tixaiti memikatehiki [cite: 1054, 1055], 'ixiarari yuariyaya meta waikari meta kememutiyi naime mete'atiti[cite: 1056, 1057].
Tewi tixaiti pikarayeitiarieni [cite: 1058], teiteri mekanitihixima'uikuni [cite: 1059], kwinimieme memiteyuti'ire [cite: 1062] mekanika'unariekuni[cite: 1063].
Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye 'aixia katinikuxaxatsi- wamiki 'axamiti'ane mitiukwinitiaki[cite: 1067, 1068].
Muxatsi mepitetikwani yu'ixata memiyiaka mipatsie matsiikiti kanayuyeitiamiki kemitiheitserie patsieti [cite: 1069, 1072]. tsipuri mepitetikwani xikutsixi mematitekaitsie[cite: 1075, 1077].

Xia'ui kemi'ane 'axamiti'ane memite'uhaxime 'itarika kaunariyariki [cite: 1079, 1080], meta 'axakememiteyurie memuhaxime kaxeta kaunariyariki[cite: 1081, 1082]. Mipai mekaniutiyuaneni [cite: 1084]: <<Kakaiyari keyumexiitiaka [cite: 1085], kemitiyurieni keyukumexuitiani tame temixeiyaki [cite: 1086, 1087], 'ahurawa kehayani meta yaketiiyini 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme kemitiyurimiki [cite: 1088, 1091], mipai yatemitehetimaniki [cite: 1092]».

Xia'ui kemi'ane 'axamiti'ane 'aixia ti'anekame mitiuteriwa [cite: 1094, 1095], meta 'aixia miti'ane 'axati'anekame mayeitiwa [cite: 1096, 1098], yiriya hekiariya memixata [cite: 1099], meta hekiariya yiriya memayeitiwa [cite: 1100], miratsiwi hakakame memixata [cite: 1101], meta makaka hatsiwime memayeitiwa[cite: 1102].
Xia'ui kemi'ane waikawa metemaiwaweme memuyuxata [cite: 1107], kwinimieme meteheutamaiwaweme memuyu'erie[cite: 1108, 1110].
Xia'ui kemi'ane kwinimieme winu memiteheuta'iwawe [cite: 1113, 1114], memikamama timiireme memititaruweniki[cite: 1115, 1116].
mete'anuye'eti tumini memanu'iwe hetsiena miraka memiteheuyehiwirieniki [cite: 1118, 1120], 'atsimikatiuyuri meta heitserie kemirexeiyaki mepikaparewiku[cite: 1121, 1124].

'Ayumieme, tai nerikwari xatsi kemititixixitsitiwa meta tai 'ixa muwawaki kemitititaiya [cite: 1127, 1130], nanarieya mitipiniya [cite: 1131], meta kwauni hepai kanitinitutu- riyari [cite: 1134, 1135] kaninani. Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye 'iniari niukiyarieya memika'utanaki'eriki meta 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme Mipatsie niukieya meminanaimaki[cite: 1136, 1138].

'Ayumieme Yawé haxiaya kaniutani yuteiterima wahepaitsita [cite: 1139], hetsiena yumamá kananukuhana meta kaniwani [cite: 1140], hirite kaniwatayuatikani [cite: 1141], mikite xatsi hepai mekateniyukuhayeikawani miranuyekikatiretsie hixiapa[cite: 1142, 1143]. Miyatiti haxiaya pikatiuhayewaxi [cite: 1144], yumamate 'akuxi kanitatseratikani[cite: 1145].

Miki wiyaritsie ti'aitame 'Utsiyaxi 'imikuri [cite: 1197], Ti'aitame Kakaiyari nekaniuxeiya wapaiti 'aheutitewametsie 'akakaime mariweti 'uwenitsie 'akaime [cite: 1197], yu'ixurikitsie mataxitianiki tukita naiti puyenikakai[cite: 1197].

Heimana mepuyewikai 'iteitametemama [cite: 1198], yuxexuiti 'anate 'ataxexuime mepexeiyatikatei [cite: 1198], hutameki yuhixie mekaneuyutinatikateitini [cite: 1198], hutamekita yi'ikate meteheutinatikatei meta hutameki mete'iwiwekai[cite: 1198].
Mipai yuxexuiti meteyutahiaweti [cite: 1199]: <<Kanipatsieka, kanipatsieka, kanipatsieka Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 1200], naitsarie kwiepa pimatsiiki witsikemi'ane [cite: 1201]».
Waniuki yuariyaya me'u'enieka, kitenie tsutumeyari kiyeyari kaniwatayuaxiani meta tukita kitsi kaniuyeyerini[cite: 1201].

Hiki nekaniutahiwa [cite: 1202]: «Xia'ui ne, nehetsie pirahiiwa[cite: 1202]. Tewi nepihiki neteta mikati'itiya pirayeneika [cite: 1202] meta teiteri 'axame'utiyuaneme watsata nepuyeika [cite: 1202], matsi Ti'aitame nepuxei, Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 1202]».
Hiki 'ana xewiti Kakaiyari teitameya nehepa kanawietiyani[cite: 1203]. Yumamatsie tii kanatukaitini [cite: 1203], tepia titikimeki mawari taiyametsie meyetukai[cite: 1203].

Mikiki netenitsie kaneniuyuitiani [cite: 1204], mipai kane- tiniutahiawe [cite: 1204]: «Neuxei, 'iki 'ateni kaniuyuitiani, 'axamiti'ane katineukuyeitiarieni [cite: 1206], pemirexeiyakai meta ke'axapemitiuyuri, pekatineuyehiwiyarieni [cite: 1207, 1208]».
Hiki Ti'aitame niukieya nekaniu'enieni mipai 'utaineme [cite: 1209, 1210]: -¿Kemi'ane [cite: 1212] nepitani'ani[cite: 1214]? ¿Kemi'ane tahetsiemieme pimie[cite: 1215]?

Hiki mipai kaniutayini [cite: 1216]: -Kenemie miki teiteri mipai ketiniwaretahiawi [cite: 1221]: >>Tsepa kwi xemita'enana [cite: 1224] xepikaheti'enatikine [cite: 1226], matsi tsepa kwi xemitaneniere matsi tixaiti xepikatexeiya [cite: 1227, 1228].

'Iki teiteri wa'iyari tsetse'ime kenayeitia [cite: 1230], wa'enakareme kenanunaxia [cite: 1231] meta mekaheuneniereme keniwarayeitia [cite: 1232], nikahirixia me'uneniere [cite: 1233], me'u'enanani [cite: 1234], meta yu'iyariki meheitimaixiani [cite: 1235], kapa mete'uhayewame 'aixia meteheu'erieti mehayeitiarieni [cite: 1236, 1237]».

Hiki mipai nekaniutayini [cite: 1238]: -¿Ti'aitame, 'iki kereutere[cite: 1239]? Miki mipai kaniutayini [cite: 1240]: <<Kepaukake kiekarite mika'unariexianitsie nixewiti mana mika'uyeikanitsie [cite: 1241], kepaukake kiita teiteri memika'ayetetikanitsie [cite: 1242], meta 'itsi yuxaita kumanekaku 'axa'anekia [cite: 1242], Yawé yunaime teiteri kepaukake 'ateewa paiti miwaranini'anitsie [cite: 1243], meta miki kwie kepaukake yuheyemeki yuxaita muyuhayewatsie[cite: 1244]. Xika 'akuxi kwie tamamatatsie mieme xewiti yuhayewaneni [cite: 1246], miki 'akuxi mekanakumaweriyariekuni[cite: 1247]. Peru kepauka xiu mawitekietsie meta tuaxa kutsunuyari kemitiyukuhayeikawa [cite: 1251], miki yirameyari mipatsie kanihikitini [cite: 1251]».

'Akatsi, Kutani nu'aya, 'Utsiyaxi teukarieya, Kura kwieyaritsie katini'aitakaitini[cite: 1254]. Miki tukaritsie Xetsini, ti'aitame Tsiriya kwieyaritsie, Pekaki Xemariyaxi nu'aya, ti'aitame 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie, Kerutsareme mekaniu'axiani me'itamienike [cite: 1254], matsi miki mepika'iyiwekaxia me'e'iwake[cite: 1254].

Rawiri paratsiyuyata niuki kaniuye'ani kename Tsiriya 'Epirahini hamatia meheyutinikai [cite: 1255], 'Akatsi 'iyarieya kaniwatayuani [cite: 1255] meta teiterimama mekaniutimamani [cite: 1255], 'itsita kiyexite 'ekaki kemitiutiyuatika hepai[cite: 1255].

Yawé Kitsariyaxi mipai katiniutahiawe [cite: 1256]: <<Kenemie 'aniwe Tsehaxi-Yatsuwi* pe'awititi 'Akatsi hetsia [cite: 1256], haa wapaiti meukatuarike manuhuyeritiarie manu'axe pekaneikaxeiyamiki [cite: 1256], huyeta 'Ekwame Kwieya makuma huyeyari manuyehane 'utɨa[cite: 1256].

Mipai ketinetahiawi meyi'iwiyaniki [cite: 1257], meta kayuwati meyeikaniki [cite: 1257], pikamaka Xetsini Tsiriyu tewiyari miha'aki [cite: 1257], meta Xemariyaxi nu'aya hixie pikamaka [cite: 1257], miki waheki pikayu'iyaritiaka huta kiyexiyari manukitsiyatikaki[cite: 1257].

Mipaitatsiere ketinetahiawi kename 'Epirahini, Xemariyaxi nu'aya hamatia meyuniti [cite: 1259] meta Tsiriyu tewiyari, mipai mete'uxa kename me'itamieni [cite: 1265], mipai memiteku'eriwaki [cite: 1265] 6 Kura kwieyaritsie mekaniye'axianikeyu [cite: 1266], mexetimariutame, mexeha'iwame manata ti'aitame Taweri nu'aya memanukakeniki[cite: 1266].

Matsi neuxei mipai ketinetahiawi mipai kename ne nehaine Yawé naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 1267]: >>Miki mipai pikaraye'ani meta mipai pikatiyini[cite: 1268]. 8 Ramatsiku, Tsiriya kanimu'uyatini [cite: 1268], meta Xetsini, Ramatsiku kanimu'uyatini [cite: 1268], matsi haika tewiyari heimana 'auxiwi wiyari 'anuyeyayu [cite: 1269] 'Epirahini kanika'unariemiki yuheyemeki kanikumawerimiki[cite: 1270].
Tsamariya 'Epirahini kanimu'uyatini [cite: 1271], meta Xemariyaxi nu'aya Tsamariya kanimu'uyatini[cite: 1272]. Xika xeme nehetsie yuri xekate'erieka, yuheyemeki 'axepikateheutere [cite: 1273]».
Yawé hutarieka 'Akatsi mipai katiniutahiawe[cite: 1274]:
-Yawé 'akakaiyari keneutawawiri 'iniari mimatsiwewirieniki [cite: 1274], tsepa kwieta tetiata paiti, yatsepa muyuawi meutitewatsie paiti[cite: 1274].
Peru 'Akatsi mipai katinita'eiya [cite: 1275]: -Ne Yawé nepikata'iniata, meta tixaiti nepikatitawawirieni[cite: 1276].

Hiki Kitsariyaxi mipai kaniutayini [cite: 1277]: <<Xekeneu'enana hiki xeme Rawiri nuiwarimama[cite: 1277]. Xeme teiteri xewa'uximatiati xepikatehayewaku [cite: 1277], yaxeikiata nekakaiyari xe'uximatiati[cite: 1277].

'Ayumieme Ti'aitame 'iniari kanixewewiriemiki [cite: 1281]: 'Himari kanitiniwemiki [cite: 1283], 'Emanuheri katiniteriwamiki [cite: 1283].† [cite: 1283] 15 Kepauka 'aixia miti'ane xeikia mitinaki'erieka [cite: 1286], 'axamiti'ane mikatinaki'erieka [cite: 1286], retsi kuneriyari xietemakame kanikwa'amiki[cite: 1286].
Kariki miki nunutsi 'aixia miti'ane katitanaki'eriwekaku 'akuxi meta 'axamiti'ane karehiawekaku [cite: 1287], miki te'aitamete memiyuhuta pemiwamakaxe wakwie kaniku'eiriwamiki[cite: 1287].

>>Yawé 'ahetsia kani'atiamiki [cite: 1288], meta 'ateiterima wahetsie metatsiere 'apaapa nuiwarimama wahetsie [cite: 1288], hatsuaku mikatiyiwekai hepai kepauka 'Epirahini Kura hamatia memeyutaxiriexiatsie paiti [cite: 1288], kariki miki 'Atsiriyatsie ti'aitame kanita'inimiki [cite: 1288]».
'Iya tukaritsie Yawé yuwikiariki xaipi kanita'inimiki 'Ekipitu hatiayaritsie 'aheteewakaku muyeika [cite: 1289], meta xiete kanita'inimiki 'Atsiriya kwieyaritsie muyeika[cite: 1289].
Miki yunaiti mekani'axiakuni 'aki'utima meukatetewatsie mekaniyuti'ituatiakuni [cite: 1290], 'ai mukatataritsie, naime 'aki'utima muyexuyatikatsie meta naime haa matinenieretsie[cite: 1290].

'Iya tukaritsie, ti'aitame 'Atsiriya kiekame hetsia nawaxa niiwiekame hepai 'Eupirata 'anutauye miemeki [cite: 1291], Yawé 'Ixaheri mu'uyatsie kanikaximiki [cite: 1291], meta huxarieya 'awie mieme metatsiere mixiyaya[cite: 1291].
'Iya tukaritsie, xewiti tewi xeime tsikeru meta yuhutame tsipuri kaniwatiwaweriyamiki[cite: 1292],

waikawa retsi mekanayexexeiyakuni [cite: 1294] retsi kunerimakame kanexeiyakamiki kimana mitiutikwa'aniki[cite: 1296]. Meta kemi'ane mana yunaiti kwiepa memuyuhayewa retsi kuneriyari xietemakame mekani'iekakuni[cite: 1297].
'Iya tukaritsie, hakewa xeimiriyari kaxie kiyeyari meku'ukai xeimiriyari pirata tuminiyariki xewiti miraye'akai [cite: 1298], miki tixaiti pikatiyuhayewa 'itsi meta xuya xeikia[cite: 1298],
miki naitsarie kwiepa kanakinimiki[cite: 1299].
Yawé mipai kanetiniutahiawe [cite: 1303]: «Xeime mexa 'a'atayeume keneuti'ika [cite: 1303], ti'utiwameki mana ketinaka'utia: Mahexi-Tsarari-Katsiwatsi* hetsie timieme [cite: 1303].
Ne nekaniwata'inimiki [cite: 1305] hipame 'aixia nemitiwamate memineniereki [cite: 1306], mawari wewiwame 'Uriyaxi meta Tsakariyaxi Kewerekiyaxi nu'aya [cite: 1306]».

Hiki 'uka tixaxatame hamatia nekaniukahuni [cite: 1312], miki kaniutihukata [cite: 1312], xeime nunutsi kaniutiniweni[cite: 1312]. Hiki Yawé mipai kanetiniutahiawe [cite: 1312]: <<Mahexi-Tsarari-Katsiwatsi ketineuteriwa[cite: 1312].

Miki nunutsi nepaapa nemaama 'akuxi mitayini kayiwekaku [cite: 1313], Ramatsiku waikawa kemirexeiyakai meta Tsamariya piinitiarika mira'iwakai 'Atsiriyatsie ti'aitame hetsia katinanitikiemiki [cite: 1313]».

Yawé tawarita mipai kanetiniutahiawe [cite: 1314]: 6 <<'Iki teiteri memiku'eiriki Tsiruhe hayari kayuwati muhane [cite: 1315], Xetsini hetsie pita memuyutemamawie [cite: 1316] meta Xemariyaxi nu'ayatsie[cite: 1317],

Ti'aitame 'ari haa 'Eupirate hatiayari wahetsie kaniwayenetiamiki haa waikawa mitirikaiye [cite: 1319, 1320]: ti'aitame 'Atsiriya kiekame kaniyianemiki kemitimariwe[cite: 1321, 1322]. Naime haa manuyehapanekai tihiniyame kanenatiyeuriexiamiki [cite: 1323, 1324], hakewa meta'atikatsie panakayeurieni[cite: 1325].

Kura kwieyaritsie paiti kaniye'amiki [cite: 1326], kanikayunitiamiki [cite: 1327], kiipitiana paiti kaniuku'atiyeimiki[cite: 1328]. Neuxei 'Emanuheri, yu'anate taweratikaiti, 'akwie kemiyewa kananukanamiki [cite: 1329].† [cite: 1333] 9 'Iki xekeneu'eni, nuiwarite, yunaiti nuiwarite 'ateewa kietari [cite: 1330, 1331]: Xekeneutihiwa kuyaxa miemeki [cite: 1332], xekanakawitekiexiakuni[cite: 1332]. Xekeneuyukuha'aritia kuyaxa xemuhuki [cite: 1338], xekanititsanariexiakuni[cite: 1339]. Yaxeketeneu'utia kexemiteyurieni [cite: 1340], matsi kanitayeitiariemiki [cite: 1341], Yaxeketeneuxata [cite: 1342], matsi miki yapikatiyini [cite: 1343], Kakaiyari tahamatia muyeikaki[cite: 1344].
Yawé karima kaneniutahiawe mipai kanetinayehitiani kename 'iki teiteri wahuye neka'uweiyani[cite: 1346]. Mipai kanetiniutahiawe[cite: 1347]:

«Xeme 'iki teiteri 'iya tita memite'uteriwa memaye'unie [cite: 1348, 1350] xemeta mipai miki xepikate'uteriwani [cite: 1351], miki memitemakaxe xeme xepikatemakaxeni [cite: 1352], miki meta xemimariutsiekaki xepikayupitiaka[cite: 1354].
Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye xeikia xeme patsiekame xekanayeitiakakuni [cite: 1355], miki xeikia xekanayexeiyakakuni [cite: 1356], miki xeikia xekanayemakaxekakuni[cite: 1356].

Yawé tuki kanihikitikamiki[cite: 1357]. Matsi tete kanihikitikamiki memitiketamirike hetsiena [cite: 1358] 'Ixaheritsie nuiwarite memuyuhuta wahetsiemieme [cite: 1359, 1360], miki tete puwarekaxirieni[cite: 1361].

Kerutsareme kiekatari wahetsiemieme Kaunari kanayeimiki meta winiyari[cite: 1363]. Yuwaikawati mekanitiketamirixiakuni [cite: 1364], mekanekaxirikuni [cite: 1365] meta mekanitimurixiakuni[cite: 1366].
Winiyari mekaniwitiiyariekuni [cite: 1368], mikitsie mekaniwirikuni [cite: 1373]».
Kepemitiwatahekiatianiki mi'ayumieme 'aixia ketineu'uta [cite: 1375], keneutseyuma 'iniari niukiyari meminetsi'aweiya watsata[cite: 1377].

'Ena xepinetsixeiya, neniwemama Yawé minetsiyetuiri wahamatia[cite: 1384]. 'Ixaheritsie 'uxa'atini kemitiyini 'iniari tepihiki Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye hetsiemieme, Tsiyuni hiriyaritsie 'amuka[cite: 1385, 1386, 1388].

Xika xewiti mipai xerahiaweni [cite: 1389]: <<Mikite wahamatia memitekuxata meta memitehetimamateke wikixi wahepai [cite: 1390] me'utiyuati wahetsia tepita'iwauni [cite: 1391], ¿tami kareuyewetse teiteri yukakaiyarixi memiwarahiaweniki meta mikite, memu'uwa wahetsiemieme[cite: 1392]?»,
ne mipai nekatinixehahiaweni [cite: 1393]: <<'Iniari niukiyari meta kepemitiwatahekiatianiki mi'ayumiemetsie xeketenewiyani [cite: 1393]».

Xeme xekaniyeha'akuni [cite: 1395] kepauka xemu'uximatiarieka meta xeyehakakwitiweti kwiepa naitsarie xeku'uwati[cite: 1397]. 'Ana teiki xeheneniereti [cite: 1398], ti'aitame meta Kakaiyari wahepaitsita 'axaxekanitiyuakuni [cite: 1399, 1400], meta kwiepa mekaneniereti [cite: 1401], 'uximatiarika xeikia mepixeiya [cite: 1404], yiriya meta marika 'etiriya tsata [cite: 1404], mewatiyiwitsie yuheyemeki mekaniukaxiriyakuni[cite: 1405].
